trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Plano
There were no other sightings in Plano on or around December 23rd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsLast night at 1:00am, I was outside on the patio and all of a sudden, a flash on my girllfriends face and the entire court yard lit up. I look up just in time to see a very bright white "fire ball" streak accross the sky. There was a visable missle like vapor trail for at least 30 Seconds afterwords, and not a sound. It was the most unusual thing i have ever witnessed in the sky! I live in North Texas and the object went east to west across the sky...
Summary: Last night at 1:00am, a flash and very bright white "fire ball" streaked accross the sky.
